title: 【官方博文】《故事模式第二季》今天发布！
author: 像素君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 乙烯_中国 于 2017-7-18 15:36 编辑 



https://static.hdslb.com/miniloader.swf?aid=11945642&page=1
STORY MODE SEASON 2 LAUNCHES TODAY!《故事模式第二季》今日发布！
Jesse’s back to face the greatest peril yet!Jesse面对着巨大危机回归了！
The second season of our narrative-led Minecraft spin-off series is here! Get ready to make some tough choices! What painful sacrifices will you make? Which hardwon friendships will you shatter? Which snazzy armour set will you wear? Why would you say that to poor Lukas, you monster?

我们的“Minecraft”系列游戏的第二季现在发布了！准备好做出一些艰难的选择吧！你会为此作出什么痛苦的牺牲？你的友谊会破碎吗？你会穿什么样式的漂亮盔甲？你为什么要对可怜的Lukas说“你这个怪物”？

The first of five episodes, titled Hero In Residence, is available to download today on loads of different platforms and devices. You can watch the trailer above! This season sees the return of Jesse as the playable character. She (or he - depending on what you choose) has risen from nerdy nobody to saviour of the realm. But this newfound heroism comes with new responsibilities - and new dangers. Something ancient and very powerful is intrigued to know just what kind of hero this Jesse claims to be!

五部分的第一章名为《英雄入驻》，你今天可以在不同的平台和设备上下载。你可以看一看上面的预告片！这一季，Jesse作为玩家的角色回归了。她（或者他——这取决于你的选择）会从一个泛泛的无名之辈到王国的救世主。但新的英雄伴随着新的责任和新的危险。这激起了某些古老而强大的东西的好奇心，想知道杰西所想的英雄是什么样的！

And so begins an all new adventure involving bitter rivalries, cursed gauntlets, obstinate llamas, mythical beings, mystic temples and much more. Check out our rundown of the characters here!

于是一场全新的冒险开始了，包括激烈的对抗，被诅咒的护手，顽固的羊驼，神秘的生物，神秘的神庙等等。点击这里来看一看人物介绍吧（点击这里查看译文）！

Or just go grab it! It’s available on Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PC, Mac, iOS, and Android-based devices!

或者你也可以去下载它！它可以在Xbox One、PlayStation 4、PC、Mac、iOS和基于android的设备上运行。
